囮字的基本解释

囮
é
用来诱捕同类鸟的鸟，称“囮子”。
媒介。
化，化生。

囮字的汉语字典释义

[①]［é］
［《廣韻》五禾切，平戈，疑。］
［《廣韻》以周切，平尤，以。］
(1)鸟媒。捕鸟人用来诱捕同类鸟的活鸟。今称囮子。
(2)媒介；诱惑物。
(3)诱骗，讹诈。
(4)化。参见“囮育”。

囮字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【囗字部】　囮； 康熙笔画：7； 页码：页217第18
【廣韻】【集韻】五禾切【韻會】【正韻】吾禾切，?音譌。【說文】譯也。率鳥者，繫生鳥以來之，名曰囮。【徐鍇曰】譯者，傳四夷及鳥獸之語。囮者，誘禽鳥也，卽今鳥媒也。　又化也。【元包經】羣類囮育，庶物甡植。【註】囮與吪同。化也。　又【廣韻】以周切，音猷。　又【集韻】以九切，音槱。義?同。

囮字的起名意思

暂无。

decoy
Basic explanation of words
decoy
é
Birds used to trap similar birds are called "囮子".
medium.
Chemistry, metaplasia.
decoy
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [é]
["Guangyun" Wuhe cut, Ping Ge, doubt. ]
["Guangyun" cuts with Zhou, Pingyou, with. ]
(1) Bird media. Bird catchers use to trap live birds of the same kind. Now called the 囮子.
(2) Medium; temptation object.
(3) Lure and blackmail.
(4) Transformation. See "囮育".
decoy
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [囗字部] 　囮; Kangxi strokes: 7; Page number: page 217-18
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Five He Cuts [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Wu He cuts,? Yin Jia. [Said the text] also translated. The one who rate the bird is from the birth of the bird, and the name is 囮. [Xu Kai said] Translator, spread the words of Siyi and birds and beasts. The 囮者, lure birds and birds, and today’s bird media.　It's changed again. [Yuan Bao Jing] group education, family relics and planting. 【Note】囮 and 吪 are the same.化 also.　[Guangyun] Cut with Zhou, Yinyou.　 [Ji Yun] cut with nine, sound 槱. Righteous? Same.
